transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING, MP QUANTUM
transcript.content:
21. May. 93 15: 33 No. 006 P. 07/ 09t
4
PRIME MINISTER
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING, MP
QUANTUM
In a broadcast on Radio 3L0 on 22 December 1992 1 referred to a number of
polls which had been reproduced In various newspapers concerning the relative
popularity of the Government and the Opposition. In that broadcast I referred
to Quatum_ as being responsible for conduct of those polls. I acknowledge
that Quantum was not responsible for or Involved In the conduct of those polls.
CANBERRA
21 MAY 1993 TEL
